availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Son of J. W. Wilson and Elizabeth Wilson. Married to Mary Priscilla Nourse Wilson. Father of Annie J. Wilson. Attorney in Louisville in 1860. County attorney for Jefferson County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 466.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville, p. 152B.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport – Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7007126, Jefferson County Deaths, p. 880.
“Death of Mr. Joseph G. Wilson,” Courier-Journal (Louisville, Ky.), June 24, 1879, p. 4.
Find A Grave, "Joseph G. Wilson (1833-1879)," Memorial #109923533, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/109923533 (accessed June 13, 2017).
